Quest_Name: One Bad Spartan Spoils the Bunch

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Spartan traitors were fueling a rebellion by arming 'helots' with weapons. Brasidas sent Kassandra to deal with these traitorous Polemarchs to gain favor with the Spartan King, Archidamos of Sparta|Archidamos.'

General_Description: '''One Bad Spartan Spoils the Bunch''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: As suggested by [[Brasidas]], Kassandra sought to appeal to King [[Archidamos of Sparta|Archidamos]] by ending the traitorous operation of arming the [[Slavery|enslaved]] ''[[helot]]s''.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra made her way southwest uphill from [[Mesoa]] village. [[Ikaros]] helped her find and scan the [[Gorani Marble Quarry|quarry]] from the crossroad.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Found them!''
Ikaros spotted leader of the traitors.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Found him!''
She reached the entrance.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This is the marble quarry Brasidas mentioned.''
She infiltrated through an opening on the palisade along the entrance, then made her way through the bushes.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The weapons have to be here somewhere.''
She spied a weapon rack inside a dark-colored tent guarded by soldiers. Before she dispatched them, she reminded herself to be discreet.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's only one Spartan here that I need to kill. It'll be easier if I don't alert the others.''
Nevertheless, she destroyed the weapon rack.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''One down, four to go.''
Kassandra moved further inside, being careful not to get detected. She spotted another one behind a {{Wiki|treadwheel crane|crane}} north of the quarry and dismantled it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's two. Time to find the others.''
She moved up a wooden ramp west, into a chamber with ladders and a hole above. She found a rack below a tower-like structure and broke it.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Three weapon racks destroyed. Won't take much longer.''
She moved back out and down to a longer chamber southeast of the quarry. Kassandra moved in and quickly destroyed the fourth weapon rack.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Only one more to go.''
Kassandra caught glimpse of the leader wearing heavy soldier armor and assassinated him. She used a nearby pulley to lift herself up to the final rack. She destroyed it and escaped the quarry.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra assassinated the leader of the treasonous band of Spartans, and destroyed the weapon racks they were going to give to the ''helots''.
Section_Trivia:
*This quest is missable. It is possible to go and meet the kings straightaway; doing this locks out One Bad Spartan Spoils the Bunch as well as [[Bully the Bullies]] quests, and grants instead [[A Legendary Hunt]] quest.
*The name of this quest is a reference to the proverb "one bad apple spoils the bunch".
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
